column5: Picked up a jar of Gulp Pink Earthworms.... wondering if anyone has used them for steelhead and their effectiveness vs. the Powebait worms?  Burt
I never got anything on the power bait ones.. got 2 on the gulps this year though

the gulp worms in the jar are always in my steelead pack, you can get 2 different sizes, skinny guys and the fatter ones...I use these equally as much as I use roe, esp the natural colour in gin clear water  best there is IMO
I,ll have to give them a try. I have had great success with the power ones. Pink and orange. Natural worm in the spring,
the skinny ones are labelled earthworms and the larger ones are labelled nightcrawlers  http://www.berkley-fishing.com/products/soft-bait/gulp
Thanks for the tip!!,I also will have to give them a try.
